body: Georgia On My Mind provides its readers with a comprehensive review of The Vagina Monologues held earlier this week in Tbilisi, the Georgian capital. Controversial as it was bound to be in a region more renowned for its patriarchal values, the event, which included performances from women from Armenia, Azerbaijan, and Georgia, was well received. The blog concludes that despite some problems with its organization the event was a positive step forward.

title: Caucasus: The Vagina Monologues
